item.confluence.chaos_stone.info: It definitely drops from the Ender Dragon.
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.mana_polariz: Restores [damage amount 10%] health when dealing vanilla magic damage
Restores [current mana percentage * damage amount 10%] health when dealing iron magic spell damage
Restores [current mana source percentage * damage amount 10%] health when dealing magic rune damage
When installed with §eIron Magic/Nova Magic§f, if current §eMana/Mana Source both exceed 50%%§f, counts as §4-0.3§9 natural health regeneration
item.wizard_terra_cuiros.the_community: Unity Heart of the Origin Stone
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.the_communit: Slight attribute boosts for all properties, increasing as game progresses

Under default settings, each elite enemy/BOSS kill increases [0.25%% critical chance + 0.5%% melee/magic/ranged damage + 0.25%% summon damage + 0.5%% max health + 0.25%% damage reduction + 0.5%% armor + 1%% movement speed + 0.03%% natural life regeneration]
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.iron_mana_fl:

§e(Mana Sickness — reduces §925§9%%§e Iron Magic spell damage)
